headline.main: BEAVERBROOK AIM IS 30,000 TANKS; Sets Goal for Year Starting in July to Match Nazis -- U.S. and Canada Would Help

lead_paragraph: LONDON, Nov. 30 -- Thirty thousand tanks must roll off the assembly lines in Britain, the United States and Canada during the year beginning next July, Lord Beaverbrook, Minister of Supply, said today. That was the figure he gave as Premier Joseph Stalin's estimate of the present German strength in tanks.
abstract: Gt Brit: Beaverbrook denies charges of tank and aircraft output conflict
